title: Falconry Schools and Instructors
description: Directory of falconry schools and certified instructors offering hands-on training for beginners and experienced falconers.

title: Mentors and Sponsors
description: Find experienced falconers willing to mentor apprentices. A licensed sponsor is required in most states before you can obtain your falconry permit.

title: Pest Bird Abatement
description: Companies and falconers offering bird abatement services using trained raptors to deter pest birds from commercial and agricultural sites.

title: Raptor Breeders
description: Licensed raptor breeders offering captive-bred hawks, falcons, and other birds of prey for falconry.

title: Raptor Veterinarians
description: Avian and raptor-specialist veterinarians experienced in treating birds of prey used in falconry.

title: Wildlife Rehabilitators
description: Licensed wildlife rehabilitators who accept injured or orphaned raptors for treatment and release.

title: Events and Demonstrations
description: Falconry meets, field trials, club gatherings, and live raptor demonstrations open to the public.

title: Gloves and Gauntlets
description: Falconry gloves and gauntlets designed to protect your hand and forearm while handling raptors.

title: Falconry Hoods
description: Leather hoods used to calm raptors by blocking their vision during transport and training sessions.

title: Jesses, Leashes, and Swivels
description: Essential tethering equipment including jesses, leashes, and swivels that keep your bird safely secured.

title: Anklets and Bewits
description: Leather anklets fitted around a raptor's legs and bewits used to attach bells and other small items.

title: Perches and Blocks
description: Indoor and outdoor perches, bow perches, and block perches suited to different raptor species and housing setups.

title: Mews Materials and Builds
description: Materials, plans, and kits for building a mews that meets state and federal housing requirements for raptors.

title: Telemetry and Trackers
description: GPS and radio telemetry systems used to track and locate your bird during free flights and hunts.

title: Scales and Health Tools
description: Digital scales, weight-tracking tools, and health monitoring equipment for daily raptor management.

title: Falconry Equipment Checklist
description: A complete checklist of every piece of equipment you need before trapping or acquiring your first bird.

title: Falconry Rules by State
description: State-by-state breakdown of falconry regulations, permit classes, and species restrictions across the US.

title: Equipment Weight Charts
description: Reference charts showing recommended equipment sizes and weights matched to common raptor species.

title: Telemetry Range Comparison
description: Side-by-side comparison of popular telemetry systems including range, battery life, weight, and price.

title: Mews Ventilation Standards
description: Guidelines for proper mews ventilation to maintain healthy airflow and prevent respiratory issues in raptors.

title: Hood Sizes Chart
description: Sizing chart for falconry hoods matched to species, with measurement tips for a proper fit.

title: Cost to Start Falconry
description: Realistic cost breakdown covering permits, equipment, mews construction, and ongoing expenses for new falconers.

title: How to Find a Falconry Sponsor
description: Practical advice on locating and approaching a licensed sponsor, including what to expect during the sponsorship process.
target_keyword: how to find a falconry sponsor

title: Apprenticeship Interview Questions
description: Common questions sponsors ask prospective apprentices and tips on how to prepare thoughtful answers.

title: How to Build a Mews
description: Step-by-step guide to designing and building a mews that meets federal and state housing standards for raptors.
target_keyword: how to build a falconry mews

title: Legal Birds for Beginners
description: Which raptor species apprentice falconers are legally allowed to fly, with notes on temperament and hunting style.

title: Bird Abatement Services
description: Professional falcon-based bird abatement for airports, farms, landfills, and commercial properties.

title: Event Demonstrations
description: Book a live falconry demonstration for fairs, schools, corporate events, and private gatherings.

title: Falconry Lessons
description: One-on-one and group falconry lessons for beginners looking to experience handling a trained raptor.

title: Pest Control with Raptors
description: Eco-friendly pest control using trained birds of prey to manage rodent and bird populations without chemicals.
